[From the CSI catalog:](https://csi-undergraduate.catalog.cuny.edu/policies/independent-studies-and-internships)

> To arrange for such courses, students must take the initiative in approaching
> faculty sponsors and in defining the project.

* Independent studies can be up to 4 credit hours.
* Faculty members will need to write a syllabus and evaluation criteria in
consultation with the student.

The form for independent studies is
[located here](https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=s_BgbwZfCU6XFZiduozH2I9ut2SejzJNuHxDKFm1cFRUNVVYNVZaQkxZTE9UV1FQU05WWUNNWVM5SS4u)
and in general, such forms are found on the [Faculty/Staff Resources page](https://www.csi.cuny.edu/faculty-staff/facultystaff-resources)
